start_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Sensor is armed.
start_msec.title: Start Msec

anyOf.description: A point in time relative to the start of a Node.

end_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Sensor is disarmed. If None, the Sensor remains armed until the Node ends.
end_msec.title: End Msec

x.description: The center of the bounding box of the clickable region, along the Board x-axis.
x.title: X

y.description: The center of the bounding box of the clickable region, along the Board y-axis.
y.title: Y

w.description: The width of the bounding box of the clickable region, in Board units.
w.title: W

h.description: The height of the bounding box of the clickable region, in Board units.
h.title: H

mask.description: The shape of the clickable region. "rectangle" uses the box itself; "ellipse" inscribes an ellipse within the box.
mask.title: Mask

FileSystemPath.description: A locator which points to an absolute filepath on the viewer's local file system.

path.description: The absolute path to the asset file in the local filesystem.
path.title: Path

FileSystemPath.title: FileSystemPath

x.description: The x-coordinate of the Card center on the Board. 0 is the center of the Board. An increase in x moves right.
x.title: X

y.description: The y-coordinate of the Card center on the Board. 0 is the center of the Board. An increase in y moves up.
y.title: Y

w.description: The width of the Card, in Board units.
w.title: W

h.description: The height of the Card, in Board units.
h.title: H

start_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Card is placed on the Board.
start_msec.title: Start Msec

anyOf.description: A point in time relative to the start of a Node.

end_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Card is removed from the Board.
end_msec.title: End Msec

prompt.description: The initial placeholder text shown in the free text response box. It disappears when the user selects the element.
prompt.title: Prompt

font_size.description: The height of the em-box, in Board units.
font_size.title: Font Size

background_color.description: The background color of the entry field.
background_color.title: Background Color

max_length.description: The maximum number of characters the user can enter. If None, no limit.
max_length.title: Max Length

HidePointerEffect.description: Effect to hide the pointer during a timespan.

start_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Effect begins.
start_msec.title: Start Msec

end_msec.description: A point in time relative to the start of a Node.
end_msec.title: End Msec

HidePointerEffect.title: HidePointerEffect

sha256.description: The SHA-256 hash of the asset file, as a hex string.
sha256.title: Sha256

media_type.description: The IANA media (MIME) type of the image file.
media_type.title: Media Type

locator.description: A location which is a claimed source of valid bytes for this Asset.

x.title: X

y.description: The y-coordinate of the Card center on the Board. 0 is the center of the Board. An increase in y moves up.

start_msec.title: Start Msec

anyOf.description: A point in time relative to the start of a Node.

end_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Sensor is disarmed. If None, the Sensor remains armed until the Node ends.
end_msec.title: End Msec

key.description: The key that triggers the Sensor when pressed down.
key.title: Key

cards.description: Set of Cards placed on the Board.

propertyNames.description: An identifier for a Card which is unique within a Node.

cards.title: Cards

sensors.description: Set of Sensors that listen for a Participant Action. The first Sensor that is triggered ends the Node.

propertyNames.description: An identifier for a Sensor which is unique within a Node.

sensors.title: Sensors

board_color.description: The color of the Board during this Node (the "background color").
board_color.title: Board Color

RelativePath.description:
A locator which points to a relative path on the viewer's local file system.
This is useful for assets that are bundled alongside a graph file, e.g., in a zip archive.
The viewer must resolve the relative path against a known base path.

relative_path.description: The relative path to the asset file in the local filesystem.
relative_path.title: Relative Path

RelativePath.title: RelativePath

x.description: The x-coordinate of the Card center on the Board. 0 is the center of the Board. An increase in x moves right.
x.title: X

y.description: The y-coordinate of the Card center on the Board. 0 is the center of the Board. An increase in y moves up.
y.title: Y

w.description: The width of the Card, in Board units.
w.title: W

h.description: The height of the Card, in Board units.
h.title: H

end_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Card is removed from the Board.
end_msec.title: End Msec

num_bins.description: The number of discrete bins in the slider.
num_bins.title: Num Bins

initial_bin_index.description: The initial bin index that the slider is set to when it first appears. If None, defaults to the middle bin.
initial_bin_index.title: Initial Bin Index

orientation.description: The orientation of the slider. In the horizontal orientation, the slider positional index grows left to right. In the vertical orientation, the slider positional index grows bottom to top.
orientation.title: Orientation

show_bin_markers.description: Whether to show the bin markers on the slider. This is best used for sliders with a small number of bins.
show_bin_markers.title: Show Bin Markers

SubmitSensor.description:
A Sensor that triggers when a submit button is initiated.
It reports the values of one or more associated SliderCards or FreeTextEntryCards

start_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Sensor is armed.
start_msec.title: Start Msec

anyOf.description: A point in time relative to the start of a Node.

end_msec.description: The time (in milliseconds) relative to Node start when the Sensor is disarmed. If None, the Sensor remains armed until the Node ends.
end_msec.title: End Msec

submitter_id.description: The ID of the TextCard that submits the Slider value. If None, the Sensor triggers immediately when the Slider value changes.
submitter_id.title: Submitter Id

source_ids.description: The CardIds of the SliderCards or FreeTextEntryCards that this Sensor is associated with.

items.description: An identifier for a Card which is unique within a Node.

source_ids.title: Source Ids

SubmitSensor.title: SubmitSensor
